clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Data Collection of Routine Use With Spectra Optia® for Platelet Depletions
clinical_study.official_title: Multicenter, Retrospective Data Collection of Routine Clinical Use With the Spectra Optia® Apheresis System for Platelet Depletion Procedures.

brief_summary.textblock: Multicenter, Retrospective Data Collection of Routine Clinical Use with the Spectra Optia® Apheresis System for Platelet Depletion Procedures.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multicenter, retrospective data collection to evaluate the in routine use performance and safety of platelet depletions performed via the Spectra Optia system. Data collection will include procedures in 2- 3 different centers in Europe done between November 2011 and April 2014.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who have undergone platelet depletion via the Spectra Optia System and who were likely to have had blood disorders, such as essential thrombocythemia, a myeloproliferative disease, or reactive (secondary) thrombocytosis.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients having received a minimum of one platelet depletion procedure via the Spectra Optia system.
- Availability of complete blood count results prior to starting and after completing the platelet depletion procedure via the Spectra Optia system.
